nodes.text: The Mygeeto Auction House was an auction house on Mygeeto. In 4 ABY, the Galactic Empire held an auction at the auction house to sell starships that had been seized from Rebel Alliance sympathizers. The Freemakers undertook a mission to steal a Theta-class H-2 executive star shuttle so that they could used its embersteel wings to build the Arrowhead. Their plan was complicated when Zander Freemaker accidentally bought an Eta-2 Actis-class light interceptor and Graballa's bounty hunter Raam accidentally bidded for the Arrowhead.
